title: What We Do
subtitle: We partner with schools and libraries in the GTA to deliver coding workshops and bootcamps!

items.title: Project Based
items.description: Our curriculum emphasizes learning by doing, and we send our students home with projects they have built to show their friends and family.

items.title: Workshops and Bootcamps
items.description: Our workshops introduce students to the world of Computer Science and Programming, and we also organize extended bootcamps where students leverage one or more programming languages to build projects.
